text: Era naagamba nti abange baana bange (bwe mutuukayo) temuyingirira mu mulyango gumu, wabula muyingirire mu milyango gya njawulo, (ngambye ntyo) wabula sisobola kubamalira kintu kyonna ewa Katonda anti okulamula kwonna tekulina gye kuli okugyako ewa Katonda, ye yekka gwe nneesize, anti abeesiga bonna ye yekka gwe bateekwa okwesiga
